• Back to overview
mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Entry Element ResearchStudy

Documentation:

A clinical trial or similar research study. Reference: list of FDA data elements describing a research study: prsinfo.clinicaltrials.gov/definitions.html

Ancestors:
  • Resource
    • DomainResource
      • EntityOrRole
        • Entity
          • ResearchStudy
Used By:
  • ResearchSubject

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      Title

      A distinguishing word or group of words naming an item.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Title
      1..1
      Purpose

      Description of the intent or use of the item.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      Purpose
      0..1
      http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/research-study-prim-purp-type (EXTENSIBLE)
      ResearchStudyPhase

      The stage in the progression of a therapy from initial experimental use in humans in clinical trials to post-market evaluation.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ResearchStudyPhase
      0..1
      Category

      The general type or class of this item.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Category
      0..*
      FocalSubject

      The person or entity that the information in this resource relates to, if different than the person of record. The subject of information can be a reference or a code, the latter when the subject is described generically, for example, in terms of a relationship to the subject of record (e.g., wife).
      DataType
      Cardinality
      CodeableConcept
      0..*
      ConditionStudied

      The condition that is the focus of the study. For example, In a study to examine risk factors for Lupus, might have as an inclusion criterion 'healthy volunteer', but the target condition code would be a Lupus SNOMED code.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ConditionStudied
      0..*
      ContactDetail

      Describes an individual and how to reach them.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ContactDetail
      0..*
      RelatedArtifact

      Items such as additional documentation, justification, or bibliographic references, that provide background for the current item.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      RelatedArtifact
      0..*
      Keyword

      Key terms to aid in searching for or filtering the study.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Keyword
      0..*
      Jurisdiction

      The country, state or other region taking legal responsibility.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Jurisdiction
      0..*
      DescriptionMarkdown

      A description of the purpose of the item.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      DescriptionMarkdown
      0..1
      Enrollment

      Description of the group or groups enrolled or qualified to be enrolled in the study.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Enrollment
      0..*
      EffectiveTimePeriod

      The date and time span for which something is active, valid, or in force.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      EffectiveTimePeriod
      0..1
      Sponsor

      The organization responsible for the execution of the study.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Sponsor
      0..1
      PrincipalInvestigator

      Indicates the individual who has primary oversite of the execution of the study.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      PrincipalInvestigator
      0..1
      Location

      Services and space and equipment provided for a particular purpose; a building or place that provides a particular service or is used for a particular industry. Could be a clinical site, community site, or a mobile facility.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Location
      0..*
      TerminationReason

      A code explaining unplanned or premature termination of a plan of treatment, course of medication, or research study.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      TerminationReason
      0..1
      Annotation

      An added or follow-up note, often after the fact, that contains metadata about who made the statement and when.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Annotation
      0..*
      StudyArm

      Arm refers to pre-specified group or subgroup of participant(s) in a clinical trial assigned to receive specific intervention(s) (or no intervention) according to a protocol.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      StudyArm
      0..*
      StudyObjective

      A goal that the study is aiming to achieve in terms of a scientific question to be answered by the analysis of data collected during the study.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      StudyObjective
      0..*
